# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
# Mobile Robot Navigation & Control â€” ELFIN v2 (lint-clean)
# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

helpers {
  hAbs(x)      = if x >= 0 then x else -x;
  hMin(a,b)    = if a <= b then a else b;
  hMax(a,b)    = if a >= b then a else b;
  wrapAngle(t) = mod(t + pi, 2*pi) - pi;
}

# â”€â”€ Plant â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
system DifferentialDrive {
  continuous_state: [x, y, theta, v, omega];   # pose + body-frame speeds
  input:            [v_l, v_r];                # wheel angular velocities

  params {
    wheel_radius : 0.05;   # m
    wheel_base   : 0.30;   # m
    max_speed    : 1.0;    # m/s
    max_omega    : 3.0;    # rad/s
    mass         : 10.0;   # kg
    inertia      : 0.2;    # kgÂ·mÂ²
    friction     : 0.1;    # unitless Coulomb drag
  }

  flow_dynamics {
    # Kinematics
    x_dot     = v * cos(theta);
    y_dot     = v * sin(theta);
    theta_dot = omega;

    # Simplified longitudinal / yaw dynamics
    v_dot     = (wheel_radius/2)*(v_r + v_l)          - friction*v;
    omega_dot = (wheel_radius/wheel_base)*(v_r - v_l) - friction*omega;
  }
}

# â”€â”€ Lyapunov candidates â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
lyapunov PathFollower {
  system DifferentialDrive;
  params { x_goal:5; y_goal:5; alpha:1; }

  V = 0.5*((x-x_goal)**2 + (y-y_goal)**2)
      + alpha*(1 - cos(theta - atan2(y_goal - y, x_goal - x)));
}

lyapunov TrajTracker {
  system DifferentialDrive;
  params {
    x_d:0; y_d:0; theta_d:0; v_d:0; omega_d:0;
    beta:0.5; gamma:0.2;
  }

  V = 0.5*((x-x_d)**2 + (y-y_d)**2
           + beta*(theta-theta_d)**2
           + gamma*((v-v_d)**2 + (omega-omega_d)**2));
}

# â”€â”€ Barrier certificates â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
barrier StaticObstacle {
  system DifferentialDrive;
  params { x_obs:3; y_obs:2; r_obs:0.5; r_robot:0.2; margin:0.1; alpha:1; }

  B        = (x-x_obs)**2 + (y-y_obs)**2 - (r_robot + r_obs + margin)**2;
  alphaFun = alpha*B;
}

barrier MultiObstacle {
  system DifferentialDrive;
  params {
    x_obs1:3; y_obs1:2;
    x_obs2:1.5; y_obs2:4;
    x_obs3:4; y_obs3:3.5;
    r_safe:0.8; alpha:1;
  }

  B        = ((x-x_obs1)**2+(y-y_obs1)**2-r_safe**2)
           * ((x-x_obs2)**2+(y-y_obs2)**2-r_safe**2)
           * ((x-x_obs3)**2+(y-y_obs3)**2-r_safe**2);
  alphaFun = alpha*B;
}

barrier DynamicObstacle {
  system DifferentialDrive;
  params {
    x_obs:2; y_obs:3; v_obs_x:0.2; v_obs_y:-0.3;
    r_safe:0.8; ttc_min:2; alpha:1;
  }

  rel_dist      = sqrt((x-x_obs)**2+(y-y_obs)**2) - r_safe;
  closing_speed = -((v*cos(theta)-v_obs_x)*(x-x_obs)
                   +(v*sin(theta)-v_obs_y)*(y-y_obs))
                   / sqrt((x-x_obs)**2+(y-y_obs)**2);

  ttc      = if(closing_speed > 0.01, rel_dist/closing_speed, 100);
  B        = ttc - ttc_min;
  alphaFun = alpha*B;
}

barrier VelocityLimit {
  system DifferentialDrive;
  params { max_speed:1; max_omega:3; alpha:1; }

  B        = (max_speed**2 - v**2)*(max_omega**2 - omega**2);
  alphaFun = alpha*B;
}

barrier Workspace {
  system DifferentialDrive;
  params { x_min:-10; x_max:10; y_min:-10; y_max:10; alpha:1; }

  B        = (x_max-x)*(x-x_min)*(y_max-y)*(y-y_min);
  alphaFun = alpha*B;
}

# â”€â”€ Controllers (modes) â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
mode WaypointNav {
  system   DifferentialDrive;
  lyapunov PathFollower;
  barriers [VelocityLimit, Workspace, MultiObstacle];

  params { k_d:0.5; k_h:2; }

  controller {
    dist  = sqrt((x - x_goal)**2 + (y - y_goal)**2);
    ang   = atan2(y_goal - y, x_goal - x);
    ang_e = wrapAngle(ang - theta);

    v_ref     = hMin(k_d*dist, max_speed);
    omega_ref = k_h*ang_e;

    v_l = (2*v_ref - omega_ref*wheel_base)/(2*wheel_radius);
    v_r = (2*v_ref + omega_ref*wheel_base)/(2*wheel_radius);
  }
}

mode TrajectoryTrack {
  system   DifferentialDrive;
  lyapunov TrajTracker;
  barriers [VelocityLimit, Workspace, MultiObstacle];

  params { k_p:0.8; k_h:2.5; k_perp:0.5; }

  controller {
    x_e = x_d - x;  y_e = y_d - y;
    th_e = wrapAngle(theta_d - theta);

    e_par  =  x_e*cos(theta) + y_e*sin(theta);
    e_perp = -x_e*sin(theta) + y_e*cos(theta);

    v_cmd     = v_d + k_p*e_par;
    omega_cmd = omega_d + k_h*th_e + k_perp*e_perp;

    v_l = (2*v_cmd - omega_cmd*wheel_base)/(2*wheel_radius);
    v_r = (2*v_cmd + omega_cmd*wheel_base)/(2*wheel_radius);
  }
}

mode ObstacleAvoid {
  system DifferentialDrive;
  barriers [VelocityLimit, Workspace, DynamicObstacle];

  params {
    x_goal:5; y_goal:5;
    x_obs1:3; y_obs1:2; x_obs2:1.5; y_obs2:4;
    attract:1; repel:0.5; influence:3; safe:1; k_h:2;
  }

  controller {
    # Goal attraction
    gx = x_goal - x;  gy = y_goal - y;
    gdist = sqrt(gx**2+gy**2);
    gx /= hMax(gdist,0.1);  gy /= hMax(gdist,0.1);

    # Obstacle 1
    o1x = x - x_obs1;  o1y = y - y_obs1;
    d1  = sqrt(o1x**2+o1y**2);
    o1x/= hMax(d1,0.1); o1y/= hMax(d1,0.1);
    rep1 = if(d1 < influence, repel*(1/d1 - 1/influence)**2, 0);

    # Obstacle 2
    o2x = x - x_obs2;  o2y = y - y_obs2;
    d2  = sqrt(o2x**2+o2y**2);
    o2x/= hMax(d2,0.1); o2y/= hMax(d2,0.1);
    rep2 = if(d2 < influence, repel*(1/d2 - 1/influence)**2, 0);

    # Resultant
    rx = attract*gx + rep1*o1x + rep2*o2x;
    ry = attract*gy + rep1*o1y + rep2*o2y;

    hdg_e = wrapAngle(atan2(ry,rx) - theta);
    min_d = hMin(d1,d2);
    v_des = max_speed*hMin(1, min_d/safe);

    omega_cmd = k_h*hdg_e;
    v_l = (2*v_des - omega_cmd*wheel_base)/(2*wheel_radius);
    v_r = (2*v_des + omega_cmd*wheel_base)/(2*wheel_radius);
  }
}

# â”€â”€ Planner & integration (style-only tweaks) â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
planner RRTStar {
  system DifferentialDrive;

  config {
    world_bounds:[x_min,x_max,y_min,y_max];
    goal_bias:0.1; max_iterations:1000;
    step_size:0.5; neighbor_radius:2; clearance:0.5;
  }

  obstacles [
    {type:"circle", x:x_obs1, y:y_obs1, radius:r_obs},
    {type:"circle", x:x_obs2, y:y_obs2, radius:r_obs},
    {type:"circle", x:x_obs3, y:y_obs3, radius:r_obs},
    {type:"rectangle", x:rect_x, y:rect_y,
                       width:rect_w, height:rect_h, angle:rect_a}
  ]

  params {
    x_min:-10; x_max:10; y_min:-10; y_max:10;
    x_obs1:3; y_obs1:2; x_obs2:1.5; y_obs2:4;
    x_obs3:4; y_obs3:3.5; r_obs:0.5;
    rect_x:5; rect_y:6; rect_w:2; rect_h:1; rect_a:0;
  }
}

integration Plan2Track {
  planner    RRTStar;
  controller TrajectoryTrack;

  config { update_rate:10; lookahead:0.5; replan_threshold:1; smooth:true; }
}

# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
# 6-DOF Manipulator â€” ELFIN v2 (lint-clean, no dynamics magic)
# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

helpers {
  hAbs(x)      = if x >= 0 then x else -x;
  hMin(a,b)    = if a <= b then a else b;
  hMax(a,b)    = if a >= b then a else b;
  wrapAngle(t) = mod(t + pi, 2*pi) - pi;
}

# â”€â”€ Plant â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
system Manipulator {
  continuous_state:
    [q1,q2,q3,q4,q5,q6,          # positions
     dq1,dq2,dq3,dq4,dq5,dq6];   # velocities
  input: [tau1,tau2,tau3,tau4,tau5,tau6];

  params {
    m1:5; m2:4; m3:3; m4:2; m5:1; m6:0.5;
    l1:0.3; l2:0.4; l3:0.4; l4:0.2; l5:0.1; l6:0.1;
    I1:0.10; I2:0.15; I3:0.12; I4:0.08; I5:0.05; I6:0.02;
    d1:0.5; d2:0.5; d3:0.5; d4:0.3; d5:0.3; d6:0.2;
    g:9.81;
  }

  flow_dynamics {
    # Î¸Ì‡ = Ï‰
    q1_dot = dq1;  q2_dot = dq2;  q3_dot = dq3;
    q4_dot = dq4;  q5_dot = dq5;  q6_dot = dq6;

    # Ï‰Ì‡  (separable, diagonal-I toy model)
    dq1_dot = (tau1 - d1*dq1 - g*m1*l1*sin(q1))/I1;
    dq2_dot = (tau2 - d2*dq2 - g*m2*l2*sin(q2))/I2;
    dq3_dot = (tau3 - d3*dq3 - g*m3*l3*sin(q3))/I3;
    dq4_dot = (tau4 - d4*dq4)/I4;
    dq5_dot = (tau5 - d5*dq5)/I5;
    dq6_dot = (tau6 - d6*dq6)/I6;
  }
}

# â”€â”€ Lyapunov â€” position tracking â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
lyapunov PosTrack {
  system Manipulator;
  params { k_p:2;
           q1_d:0; q2_d:0; q3_d:0; q4_d:0; q5_d:0; q6_d:0; }

  V = 0.5*(I1*dq1**2 + I2*dq2**2 + I3*dq3**2
          + I4*dq4**2 + I5*dq5**2 + I6*dq6**2)
      + 0.5*k_p*((q1-q1_d)**2 + (q2-q2_d)**2 + (q3-q3_d)**2
                + (q4-q4_d)**2 + (q5-q5_d)**2 + (q6-q6_d)**2);
}

# â”€â”€ Barriers â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
barrier JointLimits {
  system Manipulator;
  params {
    q1_min:-2; q1_max: 2; q2_min:-1.5; q2_max:1.5; q3_min:-2.5; q3_max:2.5;
    q4_min:-1.8; q4_max:1.8; q5_min:-1.5; q5_max:1.5; q6_min:-3; q6_max:3;
    alpha:1;
  }

  B        = (q1_max-q1)*(q1-q1_min)
           * (q2_max-q2)*(q2-q2_min)
           * (q3_max-q3)*(q3-q3_min)
           * (q4_max-q4)*(q4-q4_min)
           * (q5_max-q5)*(q5-q5_min)
           * (q6_max-q6)*(q6-q6_min);
  alphaFun = alpha*B;
}

barrier SelfCollision {
  system Manipulator;
  params { d_min:0.1; alpha:1; }

  B        = d_min**2
           - (l2*sin(q2)-l4*sin(q4))**2
           - (l2*cos(q2)-l4*cos(q4))**2;
  alphaFun = alpha*B;
}

barrier Workspace {
  system Manipulator;
  params { r_max:1; alpha:1; }

  B        = r_max**2
           - (l1*cos(q1)+l2*cos(q1+q2)+l3*cos(q1+q2+q3))**2
           - (l1*sin(q1)+l2*sin(q1+q2)+l3*sin(q1+q2+q3))**2;
  alphaFun = alpha*B;
}

barrier HumanSafety {
  system Manipulator;
  params { x_h:0.5; y_h:0.5; d_safe:0.3; alpha:1; }

  B        = (x_h-(l1*cos(q1)+l2*cos(q1+q2)))**2
           + (y_h-(l1*sin(q1)+l2*sin(q1+q2)))**2 - d_safe**2;
  alphaFun = alpha*B;
}

# â”€â”€ Modes / controllers â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
mode JointPD {
  system Manipulator;
  lyapunov PosTrack;
  barriers [JointLimits, Workspace];

  params {
    k_p1:10; k_p2:10; k_p3:10; k_p4:8; k_p5:5; k_p6:3;
    k_d1:2;  k_d2:2;  k_d3:2;  k_d4:1.5; k_d5:1; k_d6:0.5;
  }

  controller {
    tau1 = k_p1*(q1_d-q1) + k_d1*(-dq1) + g*m1*l1*sin(q1);
    tau2 = k_p2*(q2_d-q2) + k_d2*(-dq2) + g*m2*l2*sin(q2);
    tau3 = k_p3*(q3_d-q3) + k_d3*(-dq3) + g*m3*l3*sin(q3);
    tau4 = k_p4*(q4_d-q4) + k_d4*(-dq4);
    tau5 = k_p5*(q5_d-q5) + k_d5*(-dq5);
    tau6 = k_p6*(q6_d-q6) + k_d6*(-dq6);
  }
}

mode HumanCollab {
  system Manipulator;
  lyapunov PosTrack;
  barriers [JointLimits, SelfCollision, HumanSafety];

  params {
    k_p1:10; k_p2:10; k_p3:10; k_p4:8; k_p5:5; k_p6:3;
    k_d1:2;  k_d2:2;  k_d3:2;  k_d4:1.5; k_d5:1; k_d6:0.5;
    human_factor:0.5;
  }

  controller {
    kp1 = k_p1*human_factor; kp2 = k_p2*human_factor; kp3 = k_p3*human_factor;
    kp4 = k_p4*human_factor; kp5 = k_p5*human_factor; kp6 = k_p6*human_factor;

    kd1 = k_d1*(2-human_factor); kd2 = k_d2*(2-human_factor); kd3 = k_d3*(2-human_factor);
    kd4 = k_d4*(2-human_factor); kd5 = k_d5*(2-human_factor); kd6 = k_d6*(2-human_factor);

    tau1 = kp1*(q1_d-q1) + kd1*(-dq1) + g*m1*l1*sin(q1);
    tau2 = kp2*(q2_d-q2) + kd2*(-dq2) + g*m2*l2*sin(q2);
    tau3 = kp3*(q3_d-q3) + kd3*(-dq3) + g*m3*l3*sin(q3);
    tau4 = kp4*(q4_d-q4) + kd4*(-dq4);
    tau5 = kp5*(q5_d-q5) + kd5*(-dq5);
    tau6 = kp6*(q6_d-q6) + kd6*(-dq6);
  }
}

mode ForceHybrid {
  system Manipulator;
  barriers [JointLimits, SelfCollision];

Love the roadmap â€” hereâ€™s where Rust shines (and where it bites)

Rust is arguably the most natural first â€œalt-backendâ€ for ELFIN, because its core strengths (memory + thread safety, zero-cost abstractions, fearless concurrency) map neatly onto the two worlds ELFIN straddles:

  1. hard-realtime embedded control (no GC pauses, deterministic latencies)

  2. high-throughput simulation / verification (parallel Jacobian crunching without segfault roulette)

Below is a quick gut-check on each item in your list, framed around what Rust gives you â€œfor free,â€ what it complicates, and how Iâ€™d phase in a Rust generator without derailing other work.

1 Unit annotations â†’ Rust â€œdimension-safeâ€ types (high-ROI)

Why Rust is perfectWhat to watch
Strong generics + const generics let you build dimension-safe wrappers (struct Meter<T>(T)) that zero-cost compile away. Crates like uom already do most of the heavy lifting.uom can feel heavy for embedded targets; consider a micro-crate (newtype pattern + #[repr(transparent)]) for core units and feature-gate the full uom machinery.
The borrow checker will surface mixed-unit temps at compile time, giving you an even stricter net than ELFINâ€™s own static pass.Youâ€™ll need a thin mapping layer: ELFIN IR â†’ Rust generic types. Keep that as a compiler flag so you can emit plain f32 on resource-starved MCUs.

MVP path

  1. Extend the ELFIN AST with an optional UnitDim field.

  2. Emit Rust newtypes for each base unit + impl Deref<Target = f32> so math is ergonomic.

  3. Provide a --no-units flag for legacy C targets.

2 Import / namespaces â†’ Rust mod trees (medium complexity)

Rustâ€™s module system is almost a 1-to-1 match for the namespace goal:

  • Each system, helper, lyapunov could become a Rust mod, exposing a struct + impl.

  • import RigidBody6DoF â†’ use crate::physics::rigid_body::RigidBody6DoF;

Caveat: youâ€™ll want hygienic name mangling so q1_dot becomes q1_dot (snake case) and doesnâ€™t shadow another crateâ€™s symbol. Small but important.

3 Live-sim debug hooks â†’ Rust + WebAssembly (killer UX)

Rustâ†’Wasm is painless. Generate a single wasm module that:

  • exports step(dt) (RK4 on the ELFIN ODE)

  • exposes getters for any signal flagged in debug_plots { â€¦ }

TORIâ€™s front-end can then plot via web-sys without Python holding the event loop. Bonus: same wasm runs in a browser and on desktop (wasmtime).

4 Back-end diversity: start with no_std Rust embedded-HAL

Pick one MCU board (e.g., STM32 Nucleo). The Rust embedded ecosystem already gives:

  • cortex-m-rt, rtic for realtime tasks

  • embedded-hal traits for PWM / ADC / IMU

  • microcontroller::hal::PwmPin maps cleanly to ELFIN input actuators

Generate Rust code that implements an fn update(inputs) -> outputs trait; the app calls it inside the RTOS loop.

Performance: LLVM + #[inline(always)] on the inner ODE step is usually faster (and safer) than equivalent C once you enable -C target-cpu.

5 Multi-agent semantics â†’ Rust rayon / const-generic swarms (later)

After the above pieces, emitting a const-generic swarm struct:

rust

    agents: [Quadrotor; N],
    laplacian: [[f32; N]; N],
}

PhaseFeatureRust hook

Bringing Rust in early for unit-safe simulation and wasm debug gives you outsized safety & UX wins with little risk.

StepWhat changes in the compilerWhat does not change yet

  • We can start sprinkling units in every template immediately without breaking the build.
